mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.spu_id,a.base_sale_attr_id,a.sale_attr_name,v.id vid,v.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr a INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value v ON a.spu_id = v.spu_id AND a.base_sale_attr_id = v.base_sale_attr_id WHERE a.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT sa.id, sa.spu_id, sa.sale_attr_name, sa.base_sale_attr_id, sav.id sale_attr_value_id, sav.sale_attr_value_name, skv.sku_id, IF(skv.sku_id IS NULL,0,1) is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.spu_id = sav.spu_id AND sa.base_sale_attr_id = sav.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skv ON sav.id =skv.sale_attr_value_id AND skv.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE sa.spu_id = #{spuId} ORDER BY sav.base_sale_attr_id,sav.id
